About Prairie Meats

Large enough to serve you. Small enough to care.

Prairie Meats is a proud Saskatchewan business that has been providing quality meat products to local retail, wholesale and institutional customers since 1983. The company has grown exponentially since inception and today is a hallmark business in Saskatchewan and a well-known industry leader with 3 distribution centers, 5 retail locations, and over 150 employees in Saskatoon, Regina and Prince Albert.

Learn More

Services

From food service to fundraising, catering to custom processing, corporate gifts to special orders, Prairie Meats can meet your needs.

Food Service

Prairie Meats provides custom manufacturing and wholesale to Food Service establishments such as hotels, restaurants, healthcare and government Institutions.

Learn More

Fundraising

Choose Prairie Meats for your next fundraising event quality products, fast, effective and hassle-free.

Learn More

Special Orders

Whether you need a custom order, a special cut or packaging or just need to place a large bulk or group order, Prairie Meats can help you!

Learn More

Catering

Full service catering deli platters & trays or sandwich buffets, to 5 course plate services.

Get Started

Custom Processing

Custom cut, grind, wrap, curing, smoking & processing services.

Order Today

Corporate Gift Giving

Prairie Meats offers corporate gifts in product packs or gift cards. Its a great way to celebrate your employees or customers.

Give Today
